Class ImageLoader

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.cascadia.view.ImageLoader
public class ImageLoader extends Object
The ImageLoader class deals with retrieving and storing multiple images in a cache. Images are loaded once and reused to improve performance.
Author:
vincent / modified by massinissa

  • Constructor Details

    • ImageLoader

      public ImageLoader()
      Default constructor for the ImageLoader class. Initializes the image loader with default settings.

  • Method Details

    • loadImage

      public BufferedImage loadImage(String dir, String imageName)
      Loads an image from a file or retrieves it from the cache if it has already been loaded.
      Parameters:
      dir - Directory name where the file is located.
      imageName - File name of the image.
      Returns:
      The loaded image.

    • rotateImage

      public BufferedImage rotateImage(BufferedImage image, double angle)
      Rotates a given image by the specified angle.
      Parameters:
      image - The image to rotate.
      angle - The angle in degrees by which to rotate the image.
      Returns:
      A new BufferedImage containing the rotated image.
